title._content: Entrance to Ridgewood Reservoir, Brooklyn, June 23, 1874.

description._content: George Bradford Brainerd (American, 1845-1887). Entrance to Ridgewood Reservoir, Brooklyn, June 23, 1874. Wet-collodion negative. Prints, Drawings and Photographs. Brooklyn Museum/Brooklyn Public Library, Brooklyn Collection, 1996.164.2-1357. (1996.164.2-1357_glass_IMLS_SL2.jpg) Help us geotag this photograph so we can represent Brooklyn on Historypin. [or] Tweet @brooklynmuseum with the Flickr image URL, the location link to Google Maps and use the #mapBK hashtag. More about #mapBK: www.brooklynmuseum.org/mapbk
